title: Contact Us
description: We value your input and are eager to hear from you. Whether you have a question, suggestion, or simply want to get in touch, we're here to help. Our team is dedicated to providing the best possible experience for our users, and we appreciate your feedback. Please feel free to fill out the contact form below with your details and message, and we'll make sure to respond promptly. Thank you for reaching out and being a part of our community!

body.raw:
---

## FAQ

<Accordion type="single" collapsible>
  <AccordionItem value="item-1">
    <AccordionTrigger>Will EduMentorMe™ always be free?</AccordionTrigger>
    <AccordionContent>
      Yes. EduMentorMe™ will always be free for educational use, with generous
      paid plans to take learning to the next level.
    </AccordionContent>
  </AccordionItem>
  <AccordionItem value="item-2">
    <AccordionTrigger>
      Can EduMentorMe™ be used in a classroom environment?
    </AccordionTrigger>
    <AccordionContent>
      Yes. EduMentorMe™ can be used seamlessly to supplement classroom
      learning, be that online or in-person.
    </AccordionContent>
  </AccordionItem>
  <AccordionItem value="item-3">
    <AccordionTrigger>
      Is EduMentorMe™ suitable for both large and small screens?
    </AccordionTrigger>
    <AccordionContent>
      Yes. EduMentorMe™ contains an abundance of high-quality features and
      resources that are displayable on large whiteboard screens, as well as
      smaller mobile-sized screens.
    </AccordionContent>
  </AccordionItem>
</Accordion>
